title: BlackRock’s Sweeping Reorganization, Apollo Launching Seven Funds, Significance of Equal Pay Day
itunes:title: BlackRock’s Sweeping Reorganization, Apollo Launching Seven Funds, Significance of Equal Pay Day
description:
Annie Massa, Bloomberg News Investing Reporter, explains BlackRock Chief Executive Larry Fink announcing a massive overhaul of the firm’s leadership. Bloomberg News Hedge Fund Reporter Hema Parma discusses Apollo Global Management starting a spate of new funds aiming to attract a total of about $9 billion. In honor of "Equal Pay Day" Pipeline CEO Katica Roy talks about what it takes to solve the gender pay gap issue. Kevin Nicholson, Chief Market Strategist at RiverFront Investment Group, discusses why he sees value coming from investing in emerging markets. And we Drive to the Close with Michael Sheldon, Chief Investment Officer at RDM Financial Group. 

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Paul Brennan 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
